thread.title: BRIEF-Genesis Healthcare Says Qtrly Loss Per Share Attributable To Co $0.70

title: BRIEF-Genesis Healthcare Says Qtrly Loss Per Share Attributable To Co $0.70

organizations.name: brief-genesis healthcare says qtrly loss per share attributable to co

text:
May 10, 2018 / 10:13 AM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Genesis Healthcare Says Qtrly Loss Per Share Attributable To Co $0.70 Reuters Staff
May 10 (Reuters) - Genesis Healthcare Inc: * GENESIS HEALTHCARE REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS
* US GAAP REVENUE IN Q1 OF 2018 WAS $1.30 BILLION COMPARED TO $1.39 BILLION IN Q1 OF 2017
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO GENESIS HEALTHCARE $0.70
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.35, REVENUE VIEW $1.32 BILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
